      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • returnPara

        public static java.lang.String returnPara(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> para)
        change hashMap parameter to String, make it be addable to url
        参数:
        para - the parameter hasMap
        返回:
        a String value which can be added after url

      • returnHeaders

        public static okhttp3.Request.Builder returnHeaders(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> header)
        change hashMap header to Request.Builder object
        参数:
        header - the hasHMap header
        返回:
        the Request.builder

      • returnBody

        public static okhttp3.RequestBody returnBody(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> bodyFormat)
        change bodyformat hashMap to RequestBody objects
        参数:
        bodyFormat - the body hashMap, if use none, put("none",""), if form-data, put(key,value)
        返回:
        RequestBody

      • post

        public static com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject post(java.lang.String url,
                                                   java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> para,
                                                   java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> header,
                                                   java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> bodyFormat)
        send a post to a site
        参数:
        url - the website url
        para - the parameter hashMap, use put to add
        header - the header hasMap, use put to add
        bodyFormat - the body hashMap, if use none, put("none",""), if form-data, put(key,value)
        返回:
        a response json object
